questions.prompt: Ask 'How will you know when the safety plan should be used?'
questions.qtext: How will you know when the safety plan should be used?

answers.anstext: Having Thoughts about Scary Movies makes me feel sad

questions.prompt: Ask 'What can you do on your own, if you become suicidal again, to help prevent yourself from acting on your thoughts or urges?'
questions.qtext: What can you do on your own, if you become suicidal again, to help prevent yourself from acting on your thoughts or urges?'

answers.anstext: Taking a Nap makes me feel better
Making a phone call to my cousin Brenda
Watching a movie of my favorite actor

questions.prompt: Assess likelihood of use: Ask 'What do you think is the likelihood that you would be able to do this step during a time of crisis?'
questions.qtext: What do you think is the likelihood that you would be able to do this step during a time of crisis?

answers.anstext: I feel confident I can review the plan in a timely fashion
